name: HIWISH
description:
Roguelike collecting GEM game coming to itch! Try to catch as much money as you can while dodging the rocks. 

Push to your limit! Challenge yourself and stand til LVL 100!

Upgrade yourself! But choose wisely. Can you beat yourself and achieve a higher score?

Control: LEFT and RIGHT to move, UP to jump, SPACE BAR to dash ( watch out you dash energy bar)

Health and Energy will refill before every level

There are abilities and random powerups ready for you to purchase at the shop

It is still under development, please help us with your valuable comments!
